divs: sighting detailson the 28th of mar about 9 pm i headed out to my greenhouse to put some wood in the furnace. i was coming back to the house about 9:15 pm (approx. i was walking up the drive heading west. as i approached the walk to the front door i noticed good sized red and white lights through some tree limbs. i stopped to get a better look and thought to myself what kind of airplane is this. i moved to the right a step or two to get a better look at this object. that's when i saw the four red and white lights. i was looking through some large limbs and couldn't get a real good look. i moved to the left three or four steps to get out of the heavy limbs. as soon as i moved to get a better unobstructed view the lights (object?) moved with me so i could get a better look. these lights weren't any higher than maybe 100 ft or so and seemed to be just across the road in the field. this all transpired in a time frame of about 10 to 15 seconds. a few seconds after the lights moved with me they disappeared. the lights just turned off. i didn't see anything or hear anything. the sky was clear with no moon at this time. i live just east of the grissom afb about four miles off the runway. that was why my first thought was an airplane. after the lights went out i stood and scanned the heavens for something else or the same thing. nothing happened so i went into the house to tell my wife what i had just witnessed. i was excited and she got excited about the experience. i went back out to scan the sky again for about another ten minutes. my red\white lights didn't materialize. however: to the southwest to grissom afb i witnessed what appeared to be a falling star in reverse. it was just a white light that i observed coming from close to the ground and rising straight up to a good substantial altitude and then the light disappeared. i was really excited. the last time that i had witnessed any ufo type of activity was in jan 1968 in vietnam. i also must tell you that my wife and i are intuitive and on some level psychic. when i asked my mind how many i saw that night, my minds eye told me that there were actually three citings. but i can only recall the two. so now i am very diligent when i go out at night. also that night our dog drove us crazy wanting to go outside. he wanted a revolving door that evening. he would go out and stand at the end of the deck and just look in the sky. we have a lot of spirits hang around our property. i thought they were bothering him which they do alot. i told them to go back to the garden and leave the dog alone. now i know it wasn't the ornery spirits.
Summary: witnessed two sets of horizontal-paralel lights. four red lights on top and four white lights on the bottom
